name: facebook balap
css: /* Theme by http://dear-poop.tumblr.com Enjoy~ (✿◠‿◠) */ @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain(www.lastfm.de),domain(beta.last.fm),domain(last.fm), domain(lastfm.com.br),domain(lastfm.es),domain(lastfm.fr),domain(lastfm.it), domain(lastfm.pl),domain(lastfm.se),domain(lastfm.com.tr),domain(lastfm.ru), domain(lastfm.jp),domain(cn.last.fm) { body { background: #E7D1BC !important; background: url('http://colourlovers.com.s3.amazonaws.com/images/patterns/2324/2324036.png') center right repeat fixed !important; text-align:justify !important; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS' !important; color: #6F706F !important;} /* Header */ #fauxHeader, #lastfmLogo, #primaryNav .nav-link:hover, #profileLinks .divider a, #loginLink .profile-link, #loginLink .profile-link strong, #idBadgerUser, #idBadgerDropper, #siteSearchBox, #siteSearchSubmit, #headerLangToggle img.globe_icon {background-image:url("http://imageshack.us/a/img153/826/headersprite2.png") !important; color: white !important;} #header a {color: white !important;} a {color:#9F7343 !important; -webkit-transition: all 0.4s linear;-moz-transition: all 0.4s linear; transition: all 0.4s linear;} a:hover {color:#E982A6 !important; text-decoration:none !important; font-weight:bold !important; -webkit-transition: all 0.4s linear;-moz-transition: all 0.4s linear; transition: all 0.4s linear;} img {-webkit-transition: all 0.4s linear;-moz-transition: all 0.4s linear; transition: all 0.4s linear;} img:hover {opacity:0.6 !important; -webkit-transition: all 0.4s linear;-moz-transition: all 0.4s linear; transition: all 0.4s linear;} /*#fauxHeader, #fauxHeaderContainer, #header, #headerWrapper {height: 10px !important; } #fauxHeader:hover, #fauxHeaderContainer:hover {height: 70px !important;} #lastfmLogo {background:transparent !important;} #primaryNav a {color: transparent !important;}*/ header { background: -moz-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8 100%) !important; background: -webkit-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8B 100%) !important; background: -o-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8 100%) !important; border-radius: 30px 30px 0px 0px !important; border: 1px dashed #fff !important;} header h1 {color: #E982A6 !important; text-transform:uppercase !important; letter-spacing:5px !important; font-family: 'Cambria'; text-shadow: 0px 0px 3px #E982A6 !important;} header a {color: #E982A6 !important; text-transform:uppercase !important; font-size:11px !important; font-family: 'Century Gothic'; text-shadow: 0px 0px 3px #E982A6 !important;} header a:hover {text-decoration:none !important; font-weight:bold !important;} #content, article {background: #F9F3E8 !important; border-radius: 30px 30px 0px 0px !important; box-shadow: 0px 0px 15px white !important; border: 1px dashed #fff !important;} article header {padding:10px !important; margin-left:-20px !important; margin-right:-20px !important;} .artist-wiki header {background: transparent !important; padding-left: 50px !important; color:#9F7343 !important; text-shadow: 0px 0px 1px #9F7343 !important; letter-spacing:1px !important; font-family: cambria !important; font-size: 16px !important;} .heading a, .h2Wrapper {color:#E982A6 !important; text-transform:uppercase !important; font-family: 'Century Gothic'; text-shadow: 0px 0px 3px #E982A6 !important;} /* Tout ce qui concerne les tableaux */ table.recentTracks td.featured, table.searchResults tr.exactMatch td, table.eventsMedium tr.attending td, table.tracklist td.highlight { border-top: 1px solid #E7D1BC !important; background: -moz-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8 100%) !important; background: -webkit-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8B 100%) !important; background: -o-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8 100%) !important;} table td {border-color: #E7D1BC !important;} table.tracklist tbody tr:hover, table.tracklist tbody tr.open {background: #fff!important;} div.chartbar span { background: -moz-linear-gradient(bottom, #E982A6 0%, #F6BCD1 100%) !important; background: -webkit-linear-gradient(bottom, #E982A6 0%, #F6BCD1 100%) !important; background: -o-linear-gradient(bottom, E982A6 0%, #F6BCD1 100%) !important color: #fff!important;} table.chart tbody tr td, #libraryList tbody tr td { background: #F9F3E8 !important; border-top: 1px solid #E7D1BC !important;} table.chart tbody tr.odd td, #libraryList tbody tr.odd td, .candyStriped tbody tr.odd td, .withHead .topTracks li.odd { background: #fff !important; } .quote {border: 3px solid #E7D1BC !important; border-radius: 10px !important; padding:5px !important; background: -moz-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8 100%) !important; background: -webkit-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8B 100%) !important; background: -o-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8 100%) !important;} .quote img {max-width:100% !important;} .messageWrapper, span.messageWrapper {background: #E7D1BC !important; padding:5px !important;} section.global-tags li a, .btn {background-color: #E982A6!important; color: #fff !important;} section.global-tags button {background-color: #E982A6!important; color: #fff !important;} section.personal-tags li a {background-color: #E982A6!important; color: #fff !important;} section.personal-tags button {background-color: #E982A6!important; color: #fff !important;} section.no-tags button {background-color: #E982A6!important; color: #fff !important;} section.global-tags li a:hover, .btn:hover {background-color: #D16088!important; color: #fff !important;} section.global-tags button:hover {background-color: #D16088!important; color: #fff !important;} section.personal-tags li a:hover {background-color: #D16088!important; color: #fff !important;} section.personal-tags button:hover {background-color: #D16088!important; color: #fff !important;} section.no-tags button:hover {background-color: #D16088!important; color: #fff !important;} section, .tags, .r, .g8, .global-tags, .artist-wiki, .artist-top-tracks, section.artist-listeners section, .home-group, .dropdown-btn-menu {background: #F9F3E8 !important;} /* Partie droite d'une page artiste */ .suggestcorrection, section .listener-details { background: #fff !important; padding: 10px !important; border-radius: 15px !important; text-align:center !important; box-shadow: 0px 0px 3px #E982A6 !important;} .g4 h2 {color: #E982A6 !important;} /* Partie commentaires */ .author {background: -moz-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8 100%) !important; background: -webkit-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8B 100%) !important; background: -o-linear-gradient(bottom, #E7D1BC 0%, #F9F3E8 100%) !important; border-radius:10px !important;font-size:11px !important;border: #f2e9e2 !important; padding: 5px !important; text-transform:uppercase !important;letter-spacing:2px !important; font-family: 'century gothic' !important;} .message p {font-size: 12px !important; color: #6F706F !important;} /* Footer */ footer {background: -moz-linear-gradient(bottom, #F9F3E8 0%, #F9F3E8 100%) !important; background: -webkit-linear-gradient(bottom, #F9F3E8 0%, #F9F3E8B 100%) !important; background: -o-linear-gradient(bottom, #F9F3E8 0%, #F9F3E8 100%) !important; text-shadow: 0px 0px 0px #fff !important;} footer h2 {color: #E982A6 !important;} .g3 {background: transparent !important;} /* Librairie */ .wrapper { background: transparent !important;} .libraryItems {background: transparent !important; text-align:center !important; margin-left:5.5% !important;} .page, #pages {background: transparent !important;} .name {color: #E982A6 !important;} .plays {font-style:italic !important;} #libraryNavigation a {background: #fff !important; border-radius: 10px 10px 0px 0px !important; border: 1px solid #eee !important;}
